messages.subject: RE: [unschoolingbasics] I'm off
messages.msgSnippet: Hey Kelly, Eat some chocolate in Hershey for me would ya? And enjoy the conference, I am looking forward to hearing all about it and coming next year!
messages.messageBody:
Hey Kelly,



Eat some chocolate in Hershey for me would ya?



And enjoy the conference, I am looking forward to hearing all about it and
coming next year!



Sherri-lee



_____

From: kbcdlovejo@... [mailto:kbcdlovejo@...]
Sent: Friday, August 20, 2004 9:33 PM
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com; AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com;
UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com; LiveandLearn2004@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] I'm off



I've changed my mail to digest, so I'm not so overwhelmed when I get home.
I've packed the car. Left the housesitters all the animal care info. I
decorated my car! <G>

We leave tomorrow early for the conference. We're going to stop in Hershey,

PA tomorrow night and play at Hershey Park, then visit a friend in NY for a
few days before we check into the Peabody Marriot for the.....

........drumroll......

LIVE AND LEARN UNSCHOOLING CONFERENCE in PEABODY, MA AUGUST 27-29!

My last plug. This year.

See you all there! <g>

~Kelly


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
